title: How to Know if You're Falling for Your Best Friend

steps.title: Notice the telltale sign of butterflies in your stomach.
steps.content: Notice the telltale sign of butterflies in your stomach. The next time you see your best friend, note whether you feel tingly inside. When they talk to you, the words in your mind get tangled up in a huge knot and you don't know what to say. You try your best to get those words out of your mouth but it ends up that you just can't bring yourself to. If talking just became a huge challenge for you, it may be a sign you're falling in love. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Notice your inability to concentrate.
steps.content: Notice your inability to concentrate. When you go somewhere and get bored. Or, if you have extra time and feel like it, you take out your binder and a piece of paper and a few colored pencils and start doodling their name on the paper you brought out. You do this to make yourself feel that feeling, that feeling of love and a crush. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Recognize those dreams of a future together.
steps.content: Recognize those dreams of a future together. When you're asleep at night, you dream of you and them living a carefree and happy life together. Maybe you even dream about a honeymoon. Sometimes you get this one dream where they ask you out, and you say yes, and until you wake up you feel that that dream is real––you never want it to end. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Consider whether you think about them every minute of every day.
steps.content: Consider whether you think about them every minute of every day. If you try to stop it, you just can't. They have altered your mind somehow and you can't get them out of there, everywhere you go and anytime of the day that's all your imagination has in store for you, more of them.

steps.title: Notice your daydreaming.
steps.content: Notice your daydreaming. You sit down for a while and start writing, until you run out of ideas and you start to daydream about them and you like it. Until the point when someone snaps you out of it and you go back to reality. Your daydreams seem timeless and you imagine that you and them are the only two people in the world. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Note how music leaves you feeling.
steps.content: Note how music leaves you feeling. You start listening to slow love songs, and those songs explain a sweet love story and strangely remind you of them. Then it becomes your favorite type of music for a long while. You listen to those songs again and again and you just can't get enough, pretty soon you'll know every single one of the lyrics.

steps.title: Consider how easy it is for you to stay put.
steps.content: Consider how easy it is for you to stay put. If you're falling in love, you'll likely find that you just can't settle down and you find yourself wanting more and more of them. Maybe your friends also notice you've been acting strange lately. Somehow you seem to be getting a little bit clumsy––you start getting clumsy because they are the only thing that seems to go around in your mind and nothing else.

steps.title: Think about how it feels when you're apart.
steps.content: Think about how it feels when you're apart. If you find you miss them at all times, it's likely to be falling in love. [5] X Research source You are hungry to meet up again, often. You find most happiness when you're both together, not apart. You just can't wait to hang out together again.

steps.title: Consider if suddenly you seem to care about what they think of you.
steps.content: Consider if suddenly you seem to care about what they think of you. More than before that is. This is an indicator of growing love. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Think about how you feel when together.
steps.content: Think about how you feel when together. If you feel that you don't have to have a kind of "mask" around them and you feel like you can be yourself and express thoughts and feelings openly, things are off to a great and healthy start!
